text: David Thomas Gove (May 4, 1978 – April 5, 2017) was an American ice hockey player. He served as head coach of the Wheeling Nailers of the ECHL. He last played with the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins of the American Hockey League during the 2008–09 season. He played for the Carolina Hurricanes from 2000 through 2009. On April 5, 2017, Gove was found dead in Pittsburgh on April 5, 2017 from a suspected drug overdose. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Albany River Rats players Category:Drug-related accidental deaths in the United States Category:Carolina Hurricanes players Category:Grand Rapids Griffins players Category:Lowell Lock Monsters players Category:Providence Bruins players Category:San Antonio Rampage players Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:Utah Grizzlies (AHL) players Category:Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins players Category:ECHL players Category:International Hockey League (1945–2001) players
title: David Gove
